animeTitle: Detective Conan Movie 1 : The Time-Bombed Skyscraper
otherNames: 名探偵コナン 時計じかけの摩天楼, Meitantei Conan: Tokei Jikake no Matenrou
synopsis: Kudou Shin'ichi, aka Edogawa Conan, is confronted with a series of bombings which seem somehow connected to him. Who is the madman planting bombs and why is he doing it? If Shin'ichi doesn't solve the case in time, his loved one will fall victim to it.
